title: Looking for high gold/plat duo's
body:
Season 6 starts in a few days & I've had to make a new account so I lost alot of the duo's from my old account (plat 3).

I'm looking for some good consistent players looking to climb next season, I play alot & with the addition of dynamic que's I'm looking for multiple duo's.
Have all kinds of voice coms & a mic.

Chuck me an add if you're interested.

replies.body:
Mid/Sup main here.
IGN: Kat to Plat

Hi, Im currently in S1 and climbing, Im online just about everyday for awhile now and especially when the new season starts if you want to come and do ranked with me. I'm a jg main and name is riggers333

Not online til tonight but sure man, I was gold in s2 / plat in s3... hadn't played in years so I also had to make a new account. 
will be lvl 30 in like a couple days, got xp boosts on. ill add you tonight.
